item.title: Trump thanks officers and National Guard troops in D.C. stop
item.description: President Donald Trump visited law enforcement officers in D.C. as the administration continued its efforts to exert control over the city.

item.title: With grieving parents watching, Texas lawmakers pass camp safety bill
item.description: The measure was the first to clear the legislature as it responds to the catastrophic flooding that killed 25 young campers and 112 others last month.
